scripts.build: rm -rf www && mkdir www && npx @capacitor/assets generate --iconBackgroundColor '#434c5d' --splashBackgroundColor '#434c5d' && npx esbuild index.js --bundle --minify --format=esm --outfile=www/bundle.js && cp index.html mobile-polyfill.js mobile-overrides.css www/ && cp ../browser_extension/*.js ../browser_extension/*.html ../browser_extension/*.css www/ && cp -r ../browser_extension/icons www/
scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
